messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2248....Sandra's websites
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/15/02 10:23:42 AM, lurningathome@aol.com writes:  I sent her some websites and we worked on a possible easing-in plan  Same old plus
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/15/02 10:23:42 AM, lurningathome@... writes:

<< > I sent her some websites and we worked on a possible easing-in plan >>

Same old plus worldbook.

--------------

http://www2.worldbook.com/parents/course_study_index.asp


World book Typical Course of Study--that's the thing I was trying to find!
. . . .
And there's a little conference here in town early next month, cheap and
informal. Information is at this NEW website and I'm speaking once and on a
panel. Actually I might be speaking twice. Don't know yet.

http://www.rghomeschooling.org/

. . . .

My own stuff is at http://sandradodd.com/unschooling

and I'm also often to be found at www.unschooling.com

Sandra
